Glossary¶

ecosystem

Many programming languages now provide a package manager and public collection of packages for that language. Examples include the Python Package Index (PyPI), Rust’s Cargo, or JavaScript’s NPM.

backend

A backend in Anitya defines how to retrieve versions in a particular way. For example, some backends might use an API, while others use regular expressions to extract the versions from a web page.

Anitya
